context: In 2010, Paylocity was a private company (founded 1997) building its cloud-based payroll and HCM platform. The payroll market was dominated by ADP and Paychex with their outsourced service models. Cloud-based HCM was emerging with Ultimate Software and Workday. Paylocity competed in the mid-market with focus on client service and user experience. The company was growing toward its 2014 IPO.
